Congratulations to Afghanistan President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Afghanistan President 
    Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Hamid Karzai upon his election as president of the Caretaker Islamic State of Afghanistan.
 The message wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Greetings to Foreign Minister of Hungary
articles.content:
Greetings to Foreign Minister of Hungary 
    Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Somogyi Ferenc upon his appointment as foreign minister of Hungary.
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would develop on good terms in various fields, the message wished him success in the performance of his new duty.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Ukrainian Minister of Justice
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Ukrainian Minister of Justice
    Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Ukrainian minister of Justice on a visit to the DPRK.
 It was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Alexandr Lavrinovich, minister of Justice of Ukraine, on Friday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Ukrainian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Ukrainian Delegation
    Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with a delegation of the Ukrainian Ministry of Justice led by its Minister Alexandr Lavrinovich at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 The head of the delegation said that Ukraine and the DPRK have developed the cooperative relations in various fields, expressing hope that the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties would grow stronger in the future.    
 Present there were Yun Myong Guk, first deputy chief justice of the Central Court of the DPRK, and officials concerned.

Treaty Signed between DPRK and Ukraine
articles.content:
Treaty Signed between DPRK and Ukraine
    Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- A treaty on the extradition of criminals between the DPRK and Ukraine was signed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
 It was signed by Chief Justice of the Central Court of the DPRK Kim Pyong Ryul on behalf of  the DPRK side and Minister of Justice of Ukraine Alexandr Lavrinovich on behalf of the Ukrainian side.
